title: Constantine
writer: Jamie Delano, Garth Ennis, Kevin Brodbin
short_cast: Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Shia LaBeouf, Djimon Hounsou, Max Baker, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Gavin Rossdale, Tilda Swinton, Peter Stormare, Jesse Ramirez

desc: A chain-smoking, world-weary demon hunter helps a cop investigate her sister's death, plunging them into a plot involving the forces of heaven and hell.
